item.title: Ok i need help
item.dc:creator: @wootfarren wootfarren
item.description:
@wootfarren wrote:

i might not be right but if you want it to fly why you walk its gonna basically be the god command which is a series of emotes…heres its skeleton. if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“god”) && playerRights >= 2) {
setAnimation(1500);
playerSE = 1501;
playerSEW = 1851;
playerSER = 1851;
playerSEA = 1851;

now to explain…basically set animation is the start of it…so you begin to hover, playerSE is the emote when you stand there…and the rest playerSEW = 1851;
playerSER = 1851;
playerSEA = 1851;
is you moving…so you fly…you can basically do a
if (playerequipment[playercape]== ItemId))
setAnimation(1500);
playerSE = 1501;
playerSEW = 1851;
playerSER = 1851;
playerSEA = 1851;
}else if (playerequipment[playercape]==-1))
playerSE = 0x328;
playerSEW = 0x333;
playerSER = 0x338;
playerSEA = 0x326;
}
i probobly got something majorly wrong…im not sure…but that is the basic idea, i most likely missed ; or something. rep if it helped

Read full topic
